name: Inflatey Mateys
description:
A-buoy matey!

Hast ye the smarts to guide a couple ol' sea dogs 'cross a sea of buzzsaws and giant swords?

Me and me partn'r be balloons y'see? An' we're connected by an air supply y'see? As one goes up, the other goes down!

A cap'n never leaves his first mate behind! So ye best get us both to yonder goal!

Inflatey Mateys was made in 5 hours for TriJam #162.
Thanks to everyone who took the time to play!
